RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sun
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Greater turning once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Water
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn or destroy fire creatures. Rebuke, command or bolster water creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Air
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn or destroy earth creatures. Rebuke, command or bolster air creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Animal
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Speak with animals once per day, Knowledge (Nature) becomes a class skill.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Chaos
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast chaos spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Death
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You may use a death touch once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Destruction
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You gain the smite power which is usable once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Earth
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn or destroy air creatures. Rebuke, command or bolster earth creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Evil
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast evil spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Fire
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn or destroy water creatures. Rebuke, command or bolster fire creatures.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Good
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast good spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Healing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast healing spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Knowledge
RPGXplorerObject.Description: All Knowledge skills become class skills. Cast divination spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Law
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast law spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Luck
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You gain the power of good fortune which is usable once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Magic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use scrolls, wands and other devices as a wizard of one-half your cleric level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Plant
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Rebuke or command plant creatures. Knowledge (Nature) becomes a class skill.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Protection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Generate a protective ward once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strength
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Perform a feat of strength once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Travel
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You gain the freedom of movement power. Survival becomes a class skill.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Trickery
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bluff, Disguise and Hide become class skills.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: War
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Free proficiency and Weapon Focus feat with deity's favored weapon.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Knowledge (Nature)
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Egoist
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A psion who specializes in psychometabolism is known as an egoist.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Seer
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A psion who chooses clairsentience is known as a seer.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shaper
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A psion specializing in metacreativity is known as a shaper.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Kineticist
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Psions who specialize in psychokinesis are known as kineticists.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Nomad
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A psion who relies on psychoportation powers is known as a nomad.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Telepath
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A psion who chooses the discipline of telepathy is known as a telepath.

RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Bluff
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Diplomacy
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Gather Information
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Sense Motive
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Artifice
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +4 bonus on Craft checks. The character casts conjuration (creation) spells at +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Charm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Boost Charisma by 4 points once per day as a free action for 1 minute.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Community
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use calm emotions as a spell-like ability once per day. Gain a +2 competence bonus on Diplomacy checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Creation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Cast conjuration (creation) spells at +2 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Darkness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Free Blind-Fight feat.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Glory
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn undead with a +2 bonus on the turning check and +1d6 to the turning damage roll.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Liberation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain a +2 morale bonus on all saving throws against enchantment spells or effects.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Madness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The character gains an Insanity score equal to half his or her class level (see text).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Nobility
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can use Inspire Allies spell-like ability 1/day (see text).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Repose
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You may use death touch once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Rune
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Free Scribe Scroll feat.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Scalykind
RPGXplorerObject.Description: You can rebuke/command animals (reptilian creatures/snakes only).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Weather
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Survival is a class skill.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bonus Class Skill: Survival
RPGXplorerObject.Type: Bonus Class Skill Choice or Specific
